exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y : nat, x = y -> Z.of_nat x = Z.of_nat y" on hypothesis of type "Z.of_nat v = α (2 + m) - α m".
Found no subterm matching "Z.of_nat (?M1491 - ?M1492)" in Hv.

original: intros Hcontra. assert (contra : v = 0%nat). { apply (f_equal Z.of_nat) in Hv. rewrite Nat2Z.inj_sub in Hv. rewrite alpha_2 in Hv. - rewrite Z.sub_0_r in Hv. apply Z2Zp_repr_canon in Hb as [x Hx]. rewrite Hx in Hv. discriminate. - lia. } apply (f_equal Z.to_nat) in contra. rewrite Z_of_nat_complete_inf in contra. - discriminate. - apply Nat2Z.is_nonneg.
